Name: Excuse My French
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare the glass with citrus peel and sugar CRUSTA by first finding a whole lemon that fits snugly inside the top of your glass with its equator in contact with the rim of the glass.
Review: Raspberry flavours characterise this cognac sour which is served crusta-style.
History: Created in 2015 by Daniele Francini at Salvatore's Bar at Playboy Club in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Excuse My French contains 179 calories
